history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: in_prod. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_combine_r,combine,in_prod. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_combine_r,combine,in_prod. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_combine_r,combine,in_prod. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_combine_r,combine,in_prod.

ctx: intros l l' Hwf Hwf' Hrefactor x n HIn.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In x l -> In y l' -> In (x, y) (list_prod l l')" on hypothesis of type "In (x, n) l".

ctx: intros l l' Hwf Hwf' Hrefactor x n HIn.
exceptions.tactic: apply in_combine_r with (l:=(combine l l')) in HIn.

ctx: intros l l' Hwf Hwf' Hrefactor x n HIn.
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In x l -> In y l' -> In (x, y) (list_prod l l') X : forall A B : Type, list A -> list B -> list (A * B) H0 : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In (x, y) (combine l l') -> In y l' l, l' : list (nat * nat) Hwf : is_wf l Hwf' : is_wf l' Hrefactor : refactor l = refactor l' x, n : nat Hpos : n > 0 H : x = 1 -> False H2 : forall d : nat, divides x d -> d = 1 \\/ d = x Unable to unify "refactor l = refactor l'" with "In (x, n) l'".

ctx: intros l l' Hwf Hwf' Hrefactor x n HIn.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hprime was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros l l' Hwf Hwf' Hrefactor x n HIn.
exceptions.exn: In environment H4 : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In x l -> In y l' -> In (x, y) (list_prod l l') X0 : forall A B : Type, list A -> list B -> list (A * B) H3 : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In (x, y) (combine l l') -> In y l' X : forall A B : Type, list A -> list B -> list (A * B) l, l' : list (nat * nat) Hwf : is_wf l Hwf' : is_wf l' Hrefactor : refactor l = refactor l' x, n : nat Hpos : n > 0 H : x = 1 -> False H2 : forall d : nat, divides x d -> d = 1 \\/ d = x Unable to unify "n > 0" with "In (x, n) nil".

ctx: intros l l' Hwf Hwf' Hrefactor x n HIn.
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In x l -> In y l' -> In (x, y) (list_prod l l') X1 : forall A B : Type, list A -> list B -> list (A * B) H0 : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In (x, y) (combine l l') -> In y l' X0, X : forall A B : Type, list A -> list B -> list (A * B) l, l' : list (nat * nat) Hwf : is_wf l Hwf' : is_wf l' Hrefactor : refactor l = refactor l' x, n : nat Hpos : n > 0 H : x = 1 -> False H2 : forall d : nat, divides x d -> d = 1 \\/ d = x Unable to unify "is_wf l" with "False".

ctx: intros l l' Hwf Hwf' Hrefactor x n HIn.
exceptions.exn: The reference HIn was not found in the current environment.

original: intros l l' Hwf Hwf' Hrefactor x n HIn. apply in_prod with (x:=x) (y:=n) in HIn. apply in_wf with (p:=x) (n:=n) in HIn. destruct HIn as [Hprime Hpos]. apply in_combine_r with (l:=(combine l l')) in HIn. apply Hrefactor. apply Hprime. apply Hpos. apply Hwf. apply HIn.
